name: Goblin Mode (Super Heavy Studio)
description:
Those stupid adventurers are at it again!!!
Defend your goblin lair against the oncoming hordes of plebs!


Developed by Super Heavy Studio!

Inspired by many hours of Stardew Valley and Journey of the Prairie King.
Thanks ConcernedApe

Art: Sue
Music: Vince
Unity work: Rasmus

Font: Alkhemikal
